channel.title: Comments on: Additions to the Popular Reading Collection for August

item.title: By: Alan Daniel
item.dc:creator: Alan Daniel
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/staff.library.ucsf.edu/2013/09/03/additions-to-the-popular-reading-collection-for-august/#comment-171">Leslie Kleinberg</a>.
About half way through. I going to say excellent. Local poetry scene and the Haight over the years. French grade school. Troubles with roomates ... I should finish it over this weekend.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Leslie Kleinberg.

About half way through. I going to say excellent. Local poetry scene and the Haight over the years. French grade school. Troubles with roomates … I should finish it over this weekend.

item.title: By: Leslie Kleinberg
item.dc:creator: Leslie Kleinberg
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/staff.library.ucsf.edu/2013/09/03/additions-to-the-popular-reading-collection-for-august/#comment-169">Alan Daniel</a>.
That book looks good! Let me know how it is. My book club is considering reading it.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Alan Daniel.

That book looks good! Let me know how it is. My book club is considering reading it.

item.title: By: Margaret Hughes
item.dc:creator: Margaret Hughes
item.description: Thanks for keeping us updated, Rachel! It's nice to know when new books are added.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for keeping us updated, Rachel! It’s nice to know when new books are added.

item.title: By: Alan Daniel
item.dc:creator: Alan Daniel
item.description: Just checked out Fairyland / Abbott (PS 3601 B3596 Z46 2013). Author's story about growing up in San Francisco with her poet father.
item.content:encoded: Just checked out Fairyland / Abbott (PS 3601 B3596 Z46 2013). Author’s story about growing up in San Francisco with her poet father.
